text:
SetEnv is ignored in Directory or Location section (Tested with a php script)

Work arround using SetEnvIf
creator: sdalu@sdalu.com
covener@gmail.com
text: Works for me, can you dump the entire environment or log %{thevar}e to double check your test?

creator: covener@gmail.com
text: and of course include logs, config, src, etc.
Problem in fact occurs when loading mod_passenger, so I'll report it to phusion-passenger instead.
creator: sdalu@sdalu.com
covener@gmail.com
text: marking invalid for now, reopen if passenger investigation points to something in mod_env.

Also note the same problem occurs in most fastcgi/fcgid envrionments, if you
attempt to vary by context a particular request.  The first request handled
by the first fcgi process will override.
creator: wrowe@apache.org
